description.@en: Destiny is largely unknown, even to workers of miracles and arcane might. But in the Caravan Mystic, they can sacrifice a sliver of their soul to discover what lies in store for others.

effect.@en: You understand how to use the Ritual of Fortune- telling. Furthermore, you treat the Incantation Skill as a Common Skill for purposes of Fortune-telling. Finally, after successfully using Fortune-telling, the person to whom you told their future gains a Fate Point, which must be used within a month or it is lost. A person can only gain the benefits of the Weaver of Fate Trait once a month.
